modName: Longer Bound Bow If you have Mystic Binding Perk
summary:
Makes Bound Bows last almost forever (a few thousand days at least and only when you have Mystic Binding Perk) and gives you 9999 bound arrows instead of just 100.
This is basically just so you don\'t need to keep re-casting without taking away the ability to conjure and sheath(to remove) which I didn\'t want to ruin.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Bound Bows last almost forever (a few thousand days at least and only when you have Mystic Binding Perk) and gives you 9999 bound arrows instead of just 100.

This is basically just so you don\'t need to keep re-casting without taking away the ability to conjure and sheath(to remove) which I didn\'t want to ruin.
author: DarkVamprism
